description.value:
This elegant garment is made from exquisite cloth and adorned with runes. You gain these benefits while wearing the robe. If you aren't wearing armor, your base Armor Class|XPHB is 15 plus your Dexterity modifier.You have Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.Your spell save DC and spell attack bonus each increase by 2.

Attunement: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
